reviewText: If you like Noah's Arc, then you will like this movie. I enjoyed this movie and I recommend that you purchase it.
Title: Punks

reviewText: Great film when it was released. I've waited over 10 yrs for it to be placed on dvd. Finally here.
Title: Punks

reviewText: The writer is so gifted. I liked its substance and the characters were brilliant in conveying the specific roles. Hilariously funny, the message is of love is conveyed well - where you don't always get what you want, but sometimes a trick of fate happens when we least expect it. The story line has relevance and periodicity in the gay culture. Cast really complimented each other quite well. Moreover, it is nice to see a race that is so misrepresented and misunderstood portrayed in a volatile way, beyond the hustler who is just looking for only a one night stand; rather, love is the optimal objective.

reviewText: Recorded poorly.  It needs "digital remastering" if possible and a free re-release to those of us who say this crazy little movie which launched Noah's Arc the tv series and it's tag on movie.
